title: Lakeland Industries Reports Fiscal Fourth Quarter and Full Year 2025 Financial Results
content:
Q425 Net Sales Increased 49% to a Record $46.6 Million Led by a 226% Increase in Fire Services Products; FY 2025 Net Sales Increased 34% to $167.2 Million
